        protected T retrieveFormInstance(Map<String,Object> traceMap,
                     String currentStep)
        Sub classes can override this method to customize how to retrieve the form instance by step information.
        Parameters:
        traceMap -
        currentStep -
        Returns:

      • generateFormInstanceFromContext

        protected T generateFormInstanceFromContext()
        Sub classes can override this method to do some interception around form instance generation, especially some post processes.

        NOTE: DO NOT replace this method completely at sub class, if you want to do some cusomized form retrieving, override the method retrieveFormInstance(Map, String) instead.

        Returns:
